Cheap flights to New Zealand. Time to tick another one off your bucket list.

Heads up Dallas and LA! We've listed the cheapest direct-with-airline prices here. If you're in Dallas, you may see some steep discounts (as low as $594 roundtrip) booking with OTAs listed in Google Flights. If you decide to go for it, be sure to read up on your chosen OTAs and the potential tradeoffs for booking through OTAs in general. 

If, instead, you've gotta a little extra wiggle room in yoru budget and want to avoid layovers, nonstop options are available from both DFW and LAX for ~$50-$100 more roundtrip. Start here for LAX or here for DFW.
